amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to insert a complete new text.
amendment.purpose: An amendment in the nature of a substitute numbered 5 printed in the Congressional Record to insert a complete new text.

action.text: Amendment (A011) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Shays.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Shays amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 166 - 246 (Roll no. 1072).
